description:
Whether you’re touring the national parks or strolling around the concrete jungle, this will be the waist pack for you. At only 2L, it’s big enough to carry your essentials and small enough to take anywhere, so you can keep looking out for that elusive bear or less elusive squirrel.

  • Durable 610D Cordura® outer keeps your necessities protected while you cruise around the forest
  • Vislon zippered compartment is smooth to open which makes it easy to grab your phone for that quick snap
  • Two internal compartments and yellow lining make organization a breeze to keep those concert tickets at the ready
  • 4cm (1.5in) waist belt can be worn around the waist or cross-body
  • Waistbelt Circumference is 71cm-132cm (28 – 52in), so anyone can pick this up and be ready for an impromptu trip to the lake
name: Mountainsmith Trippin Lil' Fanny Pack - Unisex
